title: Iterative Learning-Based Multi-Agent System Consensus Control Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of Control Theory, Understanding of Linear Systems, and Programmatic Thinking Skills
context.additional_context: Lightweight VR simulation environment construction using smartphones, team project-based learning in groups of three

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure of multi-agent systems.
Learners can mathematically represent uncertain communication topologies using the T-S fuzzy model
Learners can design iterative learning-based distributed control protocols and verify consensus among agents through simulation
Learners can control dynamic systems in a leader-follower structure by introducing auxiliary control terms
Learners can propose control protocols to solve formation control problems in fuzzy federated connected environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
